name: HellZebu
description:
HellZebu is a first person shooter where the player has to fight against monsters in different arenas as well as to solve platforming puzzles between each arena. The main feature in the game is that the player can travel between two opposite worlds (ice and fire), and change enemies from one world to another as well. This can be useful for avoiding big hordes or for killing a specific type of monster, which is invulnerable in its original world.

The goal is to survive the arena by cleaning it from monsters and, by doing so, to get access to the next arena, and so on until surviving the last one. Each arena has a higher difficulty than the previous one.

It was developed by a team of 5 university students in a period of 10 weeks.

Download instructions

Download the zip and extract the main folder ('HellZebu').

Inside this folder, there are different files needed for the game to run correctly. DO NOT DELETE ANY OF THEM.

To play the game, execute the file named HellZebu (exe).

In the window that appears, make sure the screen configuration fits with your PC/laptop (resolution, quality...).

And you got it! Press "Play!" and enjoy!! :)
